Student opportunity - Design System

Design your website using standard styles, components and patterns Use this design system to make your service consistent with Student Opportunity. Learn from the research and experience of the central team and avoid repeating work that’s already been done.

Get Started Get Started

Styles

Finding the right accommodation is key to helping you settle in quickly. We currently have 11 self-catering undergraduate halls of residence on campus. Our own student property management and lettings agency manages more than 8,000 rooms both on and off campus, and provides advice to all full-time undergraduates.

Components

You won't be short of ways to spend your time on campus - whether it's visiting the award-winning Warwick Arts Centre, using our many sports facilities, socialising in our bars and cafés, or enjoying an open-air event. But there are peaceful spots too, with lakes, woodland and green spaces just a few minutes’ walk from central campus.

Patterns

We currently have more than 300 student-run societies. So whether you’re into films, astronomy, gaming or musical theatre, you can instantly connect with people with similar interests. Or you could try something new – Bhangra dancing or circus skills anyone?
